title: No-Bake Pumpkin Pie Filling / Dip (Robot-Ready)
description: A smooth no-bake pumpkin pie filling or dip that can be used as a pie filling, pastry filling, or cookie dip. Created from the user's provided recipe. Source: :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

source.notes: Original recipe text provided by user (no-bake pumpkin pie filling/dip).

yield.notes: Estimated servings and total volume based on ingredient totals.

ingredients.name: cream cheese
ingredients.notes: 8 oz (226 g) cream cheese, should be softened to room temperature for best smoothness.

ingredients.name: canned pumpkin (pure)
ingredients.notes: 1 cup (245 g) canned pure pumpkin or homemade pumpkin purée.

ingredients.name: whipped topping
ingredients.notes: 1 8-oz tub (226 g) of whipped topping (e.g., thawed frozen whipped topping or similar).

preparation.description: Ensure cream cheese is softened to room temperature.

conditions.recommendation: Warm in microwave at defrost/low power in short bursts (5–8 seconds), checking frequently to avoid melting.

preparation.note: If cream cheese is already soft, skip.

procedure.description: Add all ingredients to the large mixing bowl.
Mix until well combined and smooth. Scrape bowl sides once or twice with spatula.

sensors.note: Robot should verify smoothness visually or via torque feedback. If small chunks detected, continue mixing in 15–30 s increments.

procedure.description: Optional: if mixture is too thick, fold in up to 15–30 g additional whipped topping or 5–10 g milk to adjust texture. If too thin, add up to 10–20 g powdered sugar.

actions.note: Manual or robot measurement based on sensor feedback.

procedure.description: Transfer final filling/dip to serving bowl or into pie shell. Optionally top with additional whipped cream and a dusting of cinnamon.
notes: Serve immediately or chill before serving.
For pie use: press into prepared no-bake pie crust and chill 1–2 hours for best firmness (chilling step not required for dip use).

for_pie.note: Chill 1–2 hours to set if used as pie filling.

for_dip.note: Can be served immediately; chilling improves texture and flavor meld (30–60 minutes optional).

food_safety: Keep refrigerated at <= 4°C (39°F) if not serving immediately.
allergens: Contains dairy (cream cheese, whipped topping may contain dairy).
May contain traces of eggs depending on commercial whipped topping product.

assumptions: Ingredient weight conversions provided in original text were used where available.
Softened cream cheese is required for smooth texture; robot may apply gentle brief warming if equipped with a microwave/heat function (not included in steps by default).
uncertainties_and_estimates: Mixing durations are estimated (90s + 30s) — robots should use torque/viscosity/vision feedback to confirm smoothness.
Yield (servings and total volume) is estimated.

notes_for_human_operator: If cream cheese is cold and robot cannot gently warm, allow human to pre-soften or extend mixing time and use spatula to break down lumps. Original recipe text: :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
